posts.post_content:
Here is a list of T-205's that I have for sale. Please
email me at: [url]tuxman829@aol.com[/url] if you need scans 
or any additional info. All prices include shipping.

Magee  SGC 60-    75.00 SOLD
Doolan  SGC 50 -   45.00
Ferguson SGC 50 -  45.00
Paskert  SGC 50-    45.00
Birmingham  SGC 50-   50.00
Olmstead  SGC 50-    45.00

Leach  SGC 40-    32.00
Daubert SGC 40-    32.00 SOLD
Lobert SGC 40-    32.00
McElveen  SGC 40-   32.00 SOLD
Elberfeld  SGC 40-     32.00
Blackburne  SGC 40-   45.00
Crandall  SGC 40-   50.00

Merkle SGC 30-    30.00 SOLD

Lush  SGC "A"-    20.00 SOLD
Oldring SGC "A"-   20.00
Bell SGC "A"-    20.00
Steinfeldt "A"-   20.00
Street  "A"-    20.00

Please note that all the scans that I send out are before they were graded.

Thanks again,

Bob Hamlin
I'll take the mcelveen.  Thanks...please email me with payment options.   Thanks...Matt

Matt, 

Email was sent with contact info.

Thanks again,

Bob

[quote name="Bobsbats" post=851162]Matt, 

Email was sent with contact info.

Thanks again,

Bob[/QUOTE]

The proverbial "check is in the mail."  Thanks...been wanting to get my hands on this card again for a long time.  It was the first "old" card I ever owned back when I was in my early teens...take care!  Matt

First batch of cards sent....next will be sent tomorrow.

Thanks again
Thanks...card arrived today and was EXACTLY what I was looking for at the right price...hope to work with you again!

Matt,

Glad you are happy with both aspects of the deal.....Thanks again
for letting me know when you received it.

Bob

Glad to see and hear that everyone received their cards and are happy with them.

Bob
